amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the $2,661,000 in funding for reception and representation expenses for the Council on Environmental Quality and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate funding for reception and representation expenses for the Council on Environmental Quality. The amendment transfers the funds, $3 million, to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lankford amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 227 (Roll no. 668).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lankford amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 227 (Roll no. 668).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Lankford.
